DOC.brief_summary: The aim present study investigate reproducibility MP3 compare result conventional perimetry use Octopus 101 healthy subject patient macular disease .
DOC.brief_title: MP3 ( Microperimeter 3 ) Reproducibility Healthy Subjects Macular Patients
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criterion healthy subject Men Women age 18 old Written inform consent Normal finding medical history unless investigator considers abnormality clinically irrelevant Normal ophthalmological finding unless investigator considers abnormality clinically irrelevant Inclusion criterion macular disease patient Men Women age 18 old Written inform consent Presence macular disease ( dry exudative agerelated macular degeneration , diabetic maculopathy , epiretinal membrane ) Any follow exclude subject study : Any opacity ( corneal scar , dense cataract ) interfere study relevant measurement Visual acuity < 0.1 ( Snellen )
